mapper.sql: r.id id, r.create_time createTime, r.description description, r.name name
mapper.select: select from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id left join sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id=#{id}
select id, create_time createTime, description, name FROM sys_role order by create_time
